articles.description: Dozens of shops and cafes in Melbourne's CBD and inner suburbs have been listed as Tier 1 or Tier 2 exposure sites as authorities tackle a COVID outbreak at an apartment complex.
articles.content:
More than 30 new locations have been added to Victoria's COVID-19 exposure site list, including a number of stalls at South Melbourne Market.
The popular inner-city market is closed after it was lis… [+1679 chars]
